query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_categories` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `nome` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `descricao` text,
  `icone` varchar(50),
  `cor` varchar(7),
  `ordem` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `is_ativa` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `criado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `atualizado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_categories_ordem` (`ordem`),
  INDEX `idx_categories_ativa` (`is_ativa`)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FZ1nxfVKsSpRCQ.c519e6f3483f --database E9go4Z3vKfQ64CyBjNz69u --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `forum_categories` (
  `id` varchar(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  `nome` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `descricao` text,
  `icone` varchar(50),
  `cor` varchar(7),
  `ordem` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `is_ativa` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `criado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `atualizado_em` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_categories_ordem` (`ordem`),
  INDEX `idx_categories_ativa` (`is_ativa`)
)
